name: Sector 598 Demo
description:
In the future where a great event has occurred, all life lives in Sector 598.

It is a virtual dome run by the ADMIN who watches and sees all.

You are the hacker. In the mission showcased in this demo, you are trying to steal a Gem holding some juicy source code.

There are three maps in this SPRG with one boss battle at the end. The full game will have a lot more once it is finished.
